about_the_game:
GrowTok is a space for self-improvement, focus, and meaningful reflection.

Instead of endless scrolling that leads nowhere, GrowTok invites you to scroll up, toward clarity, purpose, and growth.

• Choose a path that resonates with you. Explore paths like Philosopher, Samurai, Alchemist, Eternal, or discover community-made journeys with unique perspectives.

• A distraction-free experience. No ads, no clutter, just thoughtful content designed to help you focus on what matters.

• Background music for focus. Each path includes carefully selected music to create an immersive experience.

• Minimalist and intentional. A clean, black-and-white design keeps things simple, so you can concentrate on your growth.

GrowTok isn’t about quick fixes or mindless scrolling. It’s about taking a moment to think, reflect, and move forward, one scroll at a time.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or later, or any modern Linux distribution
  • Processor: Dual-core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible GPU
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS 10.11 (El Capitan) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel ( Dual-core 2.0 GHz )
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
